title: Luis Suarez's reaction when he found out that South Korea scored

author: DonuttyBrownie
text: This is the same motherfucker who bit Chiellini in the shoulder, who showed Fulham fans the finger, who called Evra the N word, and this is the same motherfucker whose unsportsmanlike handball cheated his country into the 2010 semifinals. So he can cry and sulk all he wants while the rest of the world rejoices. Great riddance.

author: ehoneygut
text: Don't forget, he's just a shit player now too.

author: Bibabeulouba
text: Came exactly for this. Fuck that guy. Thankfully that is his last World Cup.

author: RevolutionaryChip864
text: He didn't call Evra the 'N' word, he said a latin-american slang, and Evra (who is an infamously fragile idiot) started to bitch about it all around the tabloids. As for the handball and other of his fouls, he was penalized and even _banned_ for them. Not like Maradona, or the serial cheater Sergio Ramos. It's ok to not like Suarez, but the hatred surrounding him is absolutely pathetic.

author: krautbaguette
text:
He bit opposing players on three different occasions. Clearly, he has some major issues. His unsportsmanlike behavior is also seen in other instances, such as his disgusting "save" against Ghana und subsequent crying-turned-celebration when they missed the penalty.
How about we stop babying these people who get paid millions per year.

author: litepad
text:
> call Evra the N word

Not true, he called Evra 'blackie'... It's offensive no doubt, but big difference.
